Frequently Asked Questions

Quick Answers

What is your minimum order quantity?

Our minimum order quantity varies by product, typically starting from 1,000 units for most dairy products. We also offer flexible solutions for smaller orders.

How long does international shipping take?

Shipping times vary by destination, typically 5-15 business days for most countries. We provide real-time tracking and guaranteed delivery dates.

Do you provide quality certifications?

Yes, all our products come with comprehensive quality certifications including ISO 22000, HACCP, and country-specific import certifications.

Can you handle custom packaging requirements?

We offer custom packaging solutions including private labeling, special sizing, and eco-friendly packaging options to meet your specific needs.
